"Xiandy": "Thank you for coming. I'd like to reintroduce myself."
"I'm Xiandy. I'm studying the various peculiar phenomena that occur on Halpha."
"On this occasion... It may seem like a small matter, but mysterious holograms are known to appear around the City at this time of year."
"These holograms are known as Mischief Symbols. If you find them, please let me know."
"When I look at the Mischief Symbols that appear at this time of year, I begin to feel excited. Quite a mysterious feeling."
"This phenomenon has only been observed in Central City, and there have been no changes to surrounding enemies, so you may take your time with this assignment."
"Naturally, there will be a reward for your assistance."
"I look forward to seeing your results."
"We still have much yet to learn about why our City is occasionally inundated with holographic interlopers."

"It is thought to be a function of the City itself...
Yet we cannot identify which system controls it."
